message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This is a unique opportunity not to be missed.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I recognize the value of your product, I believe a price of $1,100,000 would be more in line with my budget. I'm confident this would be a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After reviewing your offer, we've decided to counter with a price of $1,250,000. This reflects the value we place on the product and our commitment to ensuring both parties benefit from the transaction.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I'm still aiming for a price closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $1,150,000?  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise and allows us both to benefit.

Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. We've carefully considered your latest offer and propose a counteroffer of $1,225,000. This price acknowledges the value you see in the product while also reflecting our position. We hope this proposal will lead to a mutually satisfactory agreement.
Alice, we're getting closer.  To meet you halfway, I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,175,000. I'm hopeful this demonstrates my commitment to reaching a fair deal.

Bob, thank you for your effort in reaching a compromise. Based on your latest offer, we've decided to counter with a price of $1,212,500. We believe this reflects a fair balance between the value of the product and our business objectives. We look forward to your response.
